thread.title: A quick look at early Super Bowl ads: Themes of unity and diversity
thread.title_full: A quick look at early Super Bowl ads: Themes of unity and diversity

author: William A.
title: A quick look at early Super Bowl ads: Themes of unity and diversity
text:
A quick look at early Super Bowl ads: Themes of unity and diversity Posted at 7:42   William A. 
A few of the early Super Bowl ads seem to have a common theme: Interesting. The unity/diversity theme already has been reflected in number of ads. 
â€” David Axelrod (@davidaxelrod) February 6, 2017 Bringing messages of inclusivity to the #SuperBowl (so far): Airbnb, Coke, Google. Several more to come. pic.twitter.com/Er9GOJImDC
